pkgmetadata.longdescription: Group Sequential Design for a Clinical Trial with Censored Survival Data // Sample size calculation utilizing the information fraction and the alpha spending function in a group sequential clinical trial with censored survival data from underlying generalized gamma survival distributions or log- logistic survival distributions. Hsu, C.-H., Chen, C.-H, Hsu, K.-N. and Lu, Y.-H. (2018) A useful design utilizing the information fraction in a group sequential clinical trial with censored survival data. To appear in Biometrics.
